meanings.sent1: The outpouring of water from the broken pipe flooded the basement.
meanings.sent2: The outpouring of love from the community was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The outpouring of laughter at the silly joke was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The outpouring of support for the charity event was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The outpouring of tears at the sad movie was touching.

meanings.definition: A sudden and abundant expression or release of emotion, energy, or something else
meanings.sent1: The outpouring of joy at the surprise party was unforgettable.
meanings.sent2: The outpouring of anger in the argument was intense.
meanings.sent3: The outpouring of excitement at the concert was infectious.
meanings.sent4: The outpouring of creativity in her artwork was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The outpouring of relief when the exam was over was palpable.
